short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to update Trello UI when using Amazing Fields

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is for use with the Amazing Fields powerup for Trello.  It modifies the Trello UI to hide and show various items as needed based upon what the user has configured to enable in the powerup.
